summary: REQ-16 appears largely implemented via updated CSS design tokens in frontend/src/index.css (light/dark HSL variables for primary/ring/chart colors) and updating the .gradient-text utility to a green-compatible gradient. However, the diff also introduces several additional global style/utility changes not explicitly requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is to switch the color palette and adjust hardcoded accent colors that conflict with the new theme; it explicitly lists non-goals like redesigning UI/UX. These additional utilities go beyond palette/token updates.
